metadata.title: CVE-2017-17092 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: wp-includes/functions.php in WordPress before 4.9.1 does not require theunfiltered_html capability for upload of .js files, which might allowremote attackers to conduct XSS attacks via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
